tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ close) (PP (TO to) (S (VP (VBG buying) (NP (NP (DT a) (NNP Nyan) (NNP Cat) (NN t-shirt)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NNP HotTopic)))) (NP-TMP (NN yesterday))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [close/JJ nsubj>I/PRP cop>was/VBD advmod>so/RB advcl>[buying/VBG mark>to/TO dobj>[t-shirt/NN det>a/DT compound>Nyan/NNP compound>Cat/NNP nmod:at>[HotTopic/NNP case>at/IN]] nmod:tmod>yesterday/NN] punct>./.]
[half/NN nsubj>:-LRB-/JJ cop>Was/VBD neg>n't/RB nmod>[tho/NN dep>off/RP] punct>./.]
